content.prompt: Which of the following later events would most directly challenge Miloszâ€™s assessment in the third paragraph of the impact of living under communism on the human psyche?

choices.label: The declaration of martial law by the communist regime in Poland in 1981
The limited extent of the de-Stalinization program launched by Nikita Khrushchev in 1956
The failure of the 1968 Prague Spring protests against communist rule in Czechoslovakia
The high levels of popular support for the anticommunist revolutions in 1989

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
